channel.title: fatigue on Stats On the T
channel.description: Recent content in fatigue on Stats On the T

item.title: Is Fatigue Cumulative?
item.description: Fighting off fatigue in any Grand Slam match is a challenge. Does this get even harder after multiple matches?

item.title: Measuring Match Fatigue
item.description: A talk at the recent New England Symposium on Statistics in Sport (NESSIS) made me wonder whether we can observe player fatigue in tennis matches? and how?
